mapper.select: select t1.* from (SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t11.`KHLX` AS `KHDX`, t1.`PARJXKHJCSZID`, t11.`PARJXKHJCSZNAME`, t1.`PARKHZCMXID`, t1.`PARKHZCMXNAME`, t1.`SFQY`, t1.`SZQZ`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN` FROM `T_PARKHZCMX` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PARJXKHJCSZ t11 ON t1.PARJXKHJCSZID = t11.PARJXKHJCSZID ) t1 where parkhzcmxid=#{id}
mapper.sql: SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t11.`KHLX` AS `KHDX`, t1.`PARJXKHJCSZID`, t11.`PARJXKHJCSZNAME`, t1.`PARKHZCMXID`, t1.`PARKHZCMXNAME`, t1.`SFQY`, t1.`SZQZ`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN` FROM `T_PARKHZCMX` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PARJXKHJCSZ t11 ON t1.PARJXKHJCSZID = t11.PARJXKHJCSZID

SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t11.`KHLX` AS `KHDX`, t1.`PARJXKHJCSZID`, t11.`PARJXKHJCSZNAME`, t1.`PARKHZCMXID`, t1.`PARKHZCMXNAME`, t1.`SFQY`, t1.`SZQZ`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN` FROM `T_PARKHZCMX` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PARJXKHJCSZ t11 ON t1.PARJXKHJCSZID = t11.PARJXKHJCSZID
